TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but everybody forgot you a second later.

I wish to have the Space Shuttle Atlantis in my home.

Granted, It enters your home after taking off inexplicibly. You are now on fire too.

I wish people would make this place as fun as it used to be.

Granted, but to to nostalgia you think it's awful.

I wish for tea because why not.

Granted, you get the letter T.

I wish for a million jebediah kermans.

Granted, every Jeb crash a rocket in your face.

I wish EnterElysium already uploaded World War K ep.22

Granted, but it is immediately taken down due to copyright infringement.

I wish Rage097 remembered our arguments! (and many an argument did we have)

Granted, he remembers your arguments and starts a new argument because of it.

I wish for some chicken flavoured oxidiser

Granted, but i cannot corrupt that due to the fact i was in that part of 3 word story

I wish, for some oxidizer flavored chicken

Granted, but your rockets get clogged up with chicken loving people, and your rockets explode because of the pressure.

I wish that space films were realistic, not just space baloney.

Not Granted, because the makers of movies dramatize things just so they can fool people like in the movie gravity (Gravity isn't realistic, its got a space shuttle in space [which is no longer flown] and the ISS can't get de-orbited just from that thing!)

I wish that in soviet Russia, wish grants you

Granted, I don't know how to corrupt it.

So...

I wish to corrupt his wish.

Not granted, because i don't want my wish to be corrupted

I wish you did not wish for that...

Granted, I wished your death and you didn't corrupted it.

I wish KSP 0.22 without bugs.

Granted, but the bug free version is only a 2D flash game.

I wish for Jool landings to be possible.

Granted, all you have to do is beat the kraken boss battle then you will be able to lanf

I wish people would stop corrupting wishes

Granted. We stop corrupting everyone's wishes but yours.

I wish for my computer to run KSP flawlessly.

Granted, but 0.22 will make all computers run it without lag and crashes except yours which will crash during first part load.

I wish to be a Kerbal rocket (I know what I'm doing).

Granted. Jeb flies you into the sun

I wish for MAGIC

Granted, you fly yourself into the sun.

I wish for 3.75m stock parts.

Granted, they are bombs that destroy your rockets before you launch them.

I wish a mod that allows Kerbals to carry guns, bazookas...
Granted,Jeb kills everyone I wish that Bill became a fish

Granted, but then the fish gets eaten by a cat.

I wish my laptop doesn't break anymore

Granted. But you can't replace it either, and it soon becomes too old to do anything fun.

I wish the sites I go to could all be lively.

Granted, but only for 5 seconds.

I wish I had the power to ban in real life.

Granted, you ban yourself from reality.

I wish I could remember the last time I made a wish.
